item.title: GOP Rep. Mark Amodei to retire from Congress
item.description: Nevada's sole Republican in Congress, Rep. Mark Amodei, will be retiring after eight terms.

item.title: U.S. sanctions Iran's oil shadow fleet as nuke talks start
item.description: The Trump administration is sanctioning parts of Iran's energy sector while talks over Tehran's nuclear ambitions unfold in Oman.
